thread.title: Wholesale / Retail Feed, Seed, Chemical, Livestock Supply
thread.title_full: Wholesale / Retail Feed, Seed, Chemical, Livestock Supply

title: Wholesale / Retail Feed, Seed, Chemical, Livestock Supply
text: Questions Business Summary This agricultural wholesale and retail business is located in Alberta, Canada. This business sells seeds, chemicals, and supplies to farmers. They specialize in buying, cleaning, and exporting wholesale Creeping Red Fescue to customers worldwide. In addition to seed and fescue, there is an active retail farm supply store. This business is equipped with a double line of seed cleaning equipment with a capacity of up to 4,000 lbs per hour. The seed plant has a rough seed storage capacity of three million lbs, while the external storage has a capacity up to 6 million lbs. This business has been experiencing strong, steady sales for years and is poised for growth. In fact, the reason the owner is selling is because of how much the business has grown! Although primary business is local, they do have some international sales. Only typical business licenses are required, no special operation licenses needed. This agricultural company has been in business since 1953 with the current ownership starting in 1998. After years of hard work and dedication to building this business, the current owner has decided to let a new owner take it to the next level. This Alberta based business is a great opportunity to take a business that is already successful and build on that foundation to secure your future. This company could be operated in a hands-on or absentee fashion, giving the owner the ability to enjoy a flexible schedule and as much control of business activities as desired. Out of their total revenue, 6% comes from retail store sales, 30% from chemical sales, 46% from wholesale seed, 10% from retail seed, and 8% from miscellaneous. With an excellent customer list, this company offers a new owner a successful business with stable revenues. Asking $20,000,000, inventory included, property and equipment negotiable. Financials
